CustomField.description: Users populate this optional date field to indicate the date the right of rescission period for a loan ends. The right of rescission date, or midnight date, is the latest date the borrower may rescind or cancel the loan. This date only applies to non-purchase loans. By default, this field is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the latest date the borrower may rescind or cancel the loan.
CustomField.label: Right of Rescission Date
